txt.en: Listen to Thórvilon
Listen to Thórvilon and Usakâr's conversation

'I see now the strength Thórvilon possesses. He has set aside his grief to be present for his people. I don't believe in miracles or sorcerers, friend. There are far too few of both left in this world. But I believe in him. I believe in Thórvilon. I will give what strength I have to him, that Vartúlin might flourish again.'
Speak with Thórvilon and let him know the good news about finding a cure for the Lâg Dávrit.
Thórvilon has gathered with some others around Milingor's Veróth. You should join them.
Thórvilon turns quickly before you can comfort him
Listen to Thórvilon.
Comfort Thórvilon.
Listen to Thórvilon and Usakâr's conversation.
Speak with Avadhril nearby.
'She is gone.'
'We were able to find Cúridwan...'
'Milingor...'
'She made this for Vartúlin.'
'What sorcery is this?'
'For the Adúrhid. Made from ingredients our friend here gathered.'
'My grief bends me, as I have never been before.'
'This can heal your grove.'
'I could break, Usakâr.'
'But it cannot heal Milingor - she is already gone.'
'I could join her.'
'It would be so easy.'
'I know this to be a bitter brew, my friend.'
'Yes. Yes.'
'But you are an elder of Vartúlin.'
'I have this boon, would that it have come just a few days earlier.'
'But my regrets will have to wait, as you say.'
'You cannot bring her back. I cannot bring her back.'
'Thank you Usakâr.'
'But you can save Vartúlin.'
'And thank you, friend.'
Speak with Avadhril nearby
'We have much work to do...'
'But it appears our grove can be saved now, thanks to you.'
Comfort Thórvilon
'Will you help an old Kinta spread Cúridwan's salve?'
'I confess I cannot see clearly through stinging eyes.'
'Your people still need you, Thórvilon.'
'That is not your fate.'
'That is not what Milingor would have wanted for you.'
'You must use this boon to heal Vartúlin and restore what's left of the Kintai.'
'I know your grief.'
'I have felt it before as well.'
'Grief is not a fair-weather friend, Thórvilon.'
'It will always be there, waiting for you.'
'But you must be strong for your people in this moment.'
Salves for a Ravaged Land, Part 5
Join Thórvilon near Milingor's Veróth
